mapper.insert: insert into bodyguard.groups (id, name, type, goal, creator_id, created_at, member_count) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{type}, #{goal}, #{creatorId}, now(), 0)
mapper.update: update bodyguard.groups set member_count = member_count +1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from bodyguard.groups where name like #{word} or goal like #{word}
mapper.update: update bodyguard.groups set member_count = member_count - 1 where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select * from `groups` order by created_at desc
